response.job_title: Lubricants Technical Helpdesk Advisor - Italy / UK /North & South EU Macro-distributors
response.summary: I am a student of the Master of Science in Chemical Engineering at Politecnico di Milano and I obtained a Chemical Engineer Bachelor in Colombia. Currently I am working as intern in the Lubricants technical team in Shell Italy and I have had the opportunity of working in two different multinational companies both dedicated to produce flavors and fragrances where I belonged to the R&D and the Quality Control departments, respectively.
response.skills: Investigación y desarrollo, Ingeniería química, Química, Control de procesos, Materiales, Microsoft Office, Administración y dirección de empresas, Servicio de atención al cliente, Trabajo en equipo, Industria alimentaria, Simulación de procesos, Compromiso organizativo, Mecánica de fluidos computacional, Matlab, Gestión de proyectos, Microsoft Excel, Microsoft Word, ANSYS, Aspen Plus, Aspen HYSYS

profile_positions.title: Lubricants technical associate - Ukraine, Nigeria, Iceland and Malta.

profile_positions.description:
esponsibilities:
- Handling Molecule-related Customer quality complaints for all Macro Distributors in Europe and for the Italian market
-  Providing customer support by resolving general technical and services-related inquires for Italy and all European Macro Distributors.
- Revision of sample reports of lubricants for gas engines based on OEM limits
- Training customers and newcomers on Shell Services.
- Supporting translations processes for some internal Shell Websites and Mobile apps.
-  Sharing of possible new business opportunities with the local sales teams or respective distributors
- Managing TDS update/creation for Italian market
- Supporting the preparation of marketing materials.
profile_positions.title: Lubricants Technical Helpdesk Advisor - Italy / UK /North & South EU Macro-distributors

profile_positions.description: Support in the preparation of presentations and technical trainings. Update, translate and manage the products technical data sheets. Collect needs coming from the market to help shaping properly the products portfolio. Support the sales team in the interaction with the technical helpdesk. Manage the Shell LubeMatch, LubeAnalyst portals and Shell apps. Support the management of external technical requests.
profile_positions.title: Technical support intern in lubricants

profile_positions.description: Monitor of chlorine and pH levels in safe water. Measure of physico-chemical and sensory properties of meat and salty flavors, fragrances, sweet flavors and raw materials. Supervise of packing material. Create of data sheet for meat and salty flavors. Organize of sensory panels (gustatory and olfactory).
profile_positions.title: Quality control analyst

profile_positions.description: Development and preparation of new formulations for several kinds of beverage bases. Confectionery and preparation of baked food applying the correspondent flavor. Application of flavor in soup concentrates sausages and snacks. Use of laboratories and equipment for emulsification and carbonation. Organization of sensory panels.
profile_positions.title: R&D Intern in Flavors Applications

company.name: Shell
company.description:
Shell is a global energy company with around 87,000 employees in more than 70 countries. We work together to power progress through more and cleaner energy solutions. We serve more than 30 million customers at almost 46,000 retail service stations every day.

Our strategy is to accelerate the transition of our business to net-zero emissions, purposefully and profitably. #PoweringProgress
